name: Grilled Salmon
author: Nanasnthakchen
summary: My family eats lots of seafood, and salmon is one of our favorites. This is a quick and delicious recipe that will have a meal prepared in minutes! If you like heat, you may add red crushed peppers or a dash of cayenne!
directions: Combine olive oil, lemon juice, green onions, parsley, rosemary, thyme, salt, black pepper, and garlic powder in a small bowl
Set aside 1/4 cup of the marinade
Place salmon in a shallow dish and pour the remaining marinade over the top
Remove the salmon and discard the used marinade
Preheat grill for medium heat and lightly oil the grate
Place salmon on the preheated grill skin side down
Cook, basting occasionally with the reserved marinade, until the fish flakes easily with a fork, 15 to 20 minutes
